targets.expr: sum(irate(polardbx_stats_request_count_total{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"}[1m]))

sum(rate(polardbx_stats_best_effort_transaction_count_total{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) +

sum(polardbx_stats_active_connections{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"})

sum(delta(polardbx_stats_request_time_cost_total{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) / (sum(delta (polardbx_stats_request_count_total{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])) + 1) / 1000

sum(polardbx_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/

* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", id=~"^/kubepods.*"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/

* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{polardbx_name="$polardbx", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

/

* on(namespace,pod)

/
